krrood.entity_query_language.result_quantification_constraint#

Classes#

ResultQuantificationConstraint

A base class that represents a constraint for quantification.

SingleValueQuantificationConstraint

A class that represents a single value constraint on the result quantification.

Exactly

A class that represents an exact constraint on the result quantification.

AtLeast

A class that specifies a minimum number of results as a quantification constraint.

AtMost

A class that specifies a maximum number of results as a quantification constraint.

Range

A class that represents a range constraint on the result quantification.

Module Contents#

class krrood.entity_query_language.result_quantification_constraint.ResultQuantificationConstraint#

Bases: abc.ABC

A base class that represents a constraint for quantification.

abstract assert_satisfaction(number_of_solutions: int, quantifier: krrood.entity_query_language.symbolic.ResultQuantifier, done: bool) → None#

Check if the constraint is satisfied, if not, raise a QuantificationNotSatisfiedError exception.

Parameters:

  • number_of_solutions – The current number of solutions.

  • quantifier – The quantifier expression of the query.

  • done – Whether all results have been found.

Raises:

QuantificationNotSatisfiedError: If the constraint is not satisfied.

class krrood.entity_query_language.result_quantification_constraint.SingleValueQuantificationConstraint#

Bases: ResultQuantificationConstraint, abc.ABC

A class that represents a single value constraint on the result quantification.

value: int#

The exact value of the constraint.
